author: Nathaniel Taplin
title: Market’s Message: U.S. Allies and Consumers Will Pay Steel-Tariff Bill
text:
President Trump’s pledge to impose stiff new tariffs on steel and aluminum imports is unlikely to cause the most pain where he expects.
The market reaction since Mr. Trump announced his planned new tariffs has been telling in this regard. American steel futures skyrocketed and so did the share price of big U.S. steelmakers like U.S. Steel on Thursday. Canadian and Korean steelmakers have sold off sharply, with Canada’s Stelco Holdings Inc. down 6% and Korea’s Posco off as much as 5%. Chinese steelmakers have sold off too—but...
